The '''Hollow Thief's Hood''' is a [[:Category:Dark Souls: Head Armor|head armor]] piece in ''[[Dark Souls]]''. It is part of the [[Hollow Thief's Set]].

{{Description
|First paragraph = Hood worn by Hollow thieves. Used to hide a guilty countenance.
}}
==Availability==
Dropped by the [[Hollow Thief|Hollow Thieves]] in the Lower [[Undead Burg]]. They also drop the other pieces of the [[Hollow Thief's Set]].

==Characteristics==
*This hood gives no [[Poise (Dark Souls)|Poise]], but it is lightweight and gives decent [[Poison (Dark Souls)|Poison]] resist.

==Upgrades==
Requires 200 [[Soul (Dark Souls)|souls]] per upgrade.
